RSAKey

Current limitations

exponent must be smaller than 2^31.

pkcs1pad

private function pkcs1pad(src: ByteArray,  
end: int,  
n: uint,  
type: uint = 0x02):ByteArray

PKCS#1 pad. type 1 (0xff) or 2, random. puts as much data from src into it, leaves what doesn’t fit alone.

generate

public static function generate(B: uint,
E: String):RSAKey

note: We should have a “nice” variant of this function that takes a callback, and perform the computation is small fragments, to keep the web browser usable.

Parameters

B
E

Returns

a new random private key B bits long, using public expt E
